Nature millstone gallery

Get inspired by the variety of millstone patterns and create your own millstone using materials sourced from the nature around you! Take a photo of your creation and send it to kalndzirnavas.burtnieki@gmail.com

Here we gather a collection of the submitted creations.

Author: Matīšu pamatskolas PI grupas "Namiņš" grupa - Rūķīši.

Author: Biedrības Kalndzirnavas biedri

Author: Biedrības Kalndzirnavas biedri
